advancedchatlog.config.general.info.stor:
The §6maximum§r amount of lines stored in the §aChat Log§r 
§7Excessively large values may result in out-of-memory errors!
advancedchatlog.config.general.info.only: If enabled it means that §6F3+D§r and §6disconnecting§r do not apply to §bchat log§r.
advancedchatlog.config.general.info.show:
Whether or not the §6time §ris displayed in the §aChat Log §r 
The format can be configured in §7General§r
advancedchatlog.config.general.info.save: Stores a specific amount of lines into a file and loads it §6into chat log§r when the game starts.
advancedchatlog.config.general.info.relo:
Amount of lines from §6Saved Lines§r to be put back into §6Chat HUD§r.
With vanilla chat it can have weird behavior.
Setting this number big can cause a lot of lag on load.
advancedchatlog.config.general.info.scro: Time it takes for the scrolling animation to complete in milliseconds
Type of function that is applied for scrolling
advancedchatlog.config.general.info.clea:
Removes some styling information for the saved text such as click events and hover events.
This makes the file footprint less.
